mapper.select: select no, name, importance, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, status, sequence, color, process_no as processNo from task where process_no = #{no } order by sequence
select comment.no,reg_date,message,task_no, user_no, name from comment,user where user.no = comment.user_no and task_no = #{task_no} order by comment.no asc
